@-webkit-keyframes spinner_1nw4m {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
            transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
            transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@keyframes spinner_1nw4m {
  0% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg);
            transform: rotate(0deg);
  }

  100% {
    -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg);
            transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

.spinner_1nw4m {
  display: -webkit-box;
  display: flex;
  -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
  -webkit-box-direction: normal;
          flex-direction: row;
  width: 96px;
  height: 96px;
  margin: auto;
  -webkit-box-pack: center;
          justify-content: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
          align-items: center;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 10;
  top: calc(50% - 48px);
  left: calc(50% - 48px);
}

    content: ' ';
    display: block;

  }

        overflow: hidden;
      }

.mobileStyle_1uY7r.article_20VGm.narrow_26l3g .headline_3jlV2 {
        padding: 0;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
      }

        font-size: 11px;
        min-width: auto;
      }

        border: none;
        padding-bottom: 60px;
        padding-left: 0;
        padding-right: 0;
      }

.mobileStyle_1uY7r.article_20VGm.narrow_26l3g .viewMoreWithLogo_2tlZr {
        width: calc(100% + 2px);
        left: -1px;
        bottom: -1px;
      }

.mobileStyle_1uY7r.article_20VGm.narrow_26l3g .viewMoreWithLogo_2tlZr::after {
          display: none;
          width: calc(100% - 1px);
          left: 0;
        }

.mobileStyle_1uY7r.promo_2q5iA.narrow_26l3g .tabSelector_3VEPi {
        height: 23px;
        min-width: auto;
      }

        padding-top: 50px;
        padding-bottom: 50px;
      }

      }

      }
